TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContentDispositionHeaderValue extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContentDispositionHeaderValue extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 表示 Content-Disposition 标头的值。

span.span: Represents the value of the Content-Disposition header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容处置标头通常用于处理文件上传和下载。The Content-Disposition header is normally used for working with file uploads and downloads. 格式与其他标头的不同之处在于，它是一个具有处理类型的单个标头，后跟一个参数列表，其中一些参数定义正确。The format differs from other headers in that it is a single header with a disposition type followed by a list of parameters, some of which are well defined. 此标头用在两个不同的上下文中：This header is used in two different contexts: 1. 类中嵌套的正文内容的 MIME 标头。A MIME header for nested body content in the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 IETF RFC 2183。For more information, see IETF RFC 2183. 2. 类中的 HTTP 标头。An HTTP header in class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 IETF RFC 6266。For more information, see IETF RFC 6266.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 内容正文部分的处置类型。

span.span: The disposition type for a content body part.
The disposition type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要在显示消息时自动显示正文部分，则应将其标记为 "内联" 的 属性。A body part should be marked with a property of "inline" if it is intended to be displayed automatically upon display of the message. 可以使用 "附件" 的 属性指定正文部分，以指示它们不同于 HTTP 请求或响应的正文。A body part can be designated with a property of "attachment" to indicate that they are separate from the main body of the HTTP request or response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用非 ascii 字符的 MIME 编码。The property uses MIME encoding for non-ascii characters.

summary.span: 一条建议，提议在实体被分离并存储在单独文件中时如何构建文件名来存储要使用的消息有效负载。

span.span: A suggestion for how to construct filenames for storing message payloads to be used if the entities are detached and stored in a separate files.
A suggested filename of the form filename\*.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用 IETF RFC 5987 编码。The property uses IETF RFC 5987 encoding. 和 属性的不同之处在于 使用在 IETF RFC 5987 中定义的编码，这允许使用 ISO-8859-1 字符集中不存在的字符。The and properties differ only in that uses the encoding defined in IETF RFC 5987, allowing the use of characters not present in the ISO-8859-1 character set.

summary.span: 充当 对象的哈希函数。

span.span: Serves as a hash function for an object.
A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希代码是在相等测试期间用于标识对象的数字值。A hash code is a numeric value that is used to identify an object during equality testing. 它还可用作集合中对象的索引。It can also serve as an index for an object in a collection. 方法适合在哈希算法和数据结构（如哈希表）中使用。The method is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
